subject: Headless CLI: support -- end-of-options + fix -p swallowing flags
description: Update packages/terminal/src/index.tsx (or extracted parser) to honor  and to treat -p/--print missing-arg if the next token is another flag. Ensure flags after -p still parse (e.g.,  errors for missing prompt rather than using  as prompt). Add unit tests for prompt starting with '-' using  separator.
